argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ressusp.1 | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ressusp.2 | |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ressuss | |- ( A e. J -> ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) = ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) = ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> W e. UnifSp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( UnifSt ` W ) = ( UnifSt ` W ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 2 | #P_isusp | |- ( W e. UnifSp <-> ( ( UnifSt ` W ) e. ( UnifOn ` B ) /\ J = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( ( UnifSt ` W ) e. ( UnifOn ` B ) /\ J = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( UnifSt ` W ) e. ( UnifOn ` B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> W e. TopSp ) |
| 11 | 1, 2 | #P_istps | |- ( W e. TopSp <-> J e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> J e. ( TopOn ` B ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> A e. J ) |
| 14 |  | #P_toponss | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` B ) /\ A e. J ) -> A C_ B ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> A C_ B ) |
| 16 |  | #P_trust | |- ( ( ( UnifSt ` W ) e. ( UnifOn ` B ) /\ A C_ B ) -> ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` A ) ) |
| 17 | 9, 15, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` A ) ) |
| 18 | 4, 17 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` A ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( W |`s A ) = ( W |`s A ) |
| 20 | 19, 1 | #P_ressbas2 | |- ( A C_ B -> A = ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 20 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> A = ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( UnifOn ` A ) = ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 22 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 8 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> J = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) ) |
| 25 | 13, 24 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> A e. ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_restutopopn | |- ( ( ( UnifSt ` W ) e. ( UnifOn ` B ) /\ A e. ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) |`t A ) = ( unifTop ` ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 9, 25, 26 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) |`t A ) = ( unifTop ` ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) ) |
| 28 | 24 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( J |`t A ) = ( ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` W ) ) |`t A ) ) |
| 29 | 4 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) = ( unifTop ` ( ( UnifSt ` W ) |`t ( A X. A ) ) ) ) |
| 30 | 27, 28, 29 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( J |`t A ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 31 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) = ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) = ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) |
| 33 | 19, 2 | #P_resstopn | |- ( J |`t A ) = ( TopOpen ` ( W |`s A ) ) |
| 34 | 31, 32, 33 | #P_isusp | |- ( ( W |`s A ) e. UnifSp <-> ( ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) e. ( UnifOn ` ( Base ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) /\ ( J |`t A ) = ( unifTop ` ( UnifSt ` ( W |`s A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 35 | 23, 30, 34 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( W e. UnifSp /\ W e. TopSp /\ A e. J ) -> ( W |`s A ) e. UnifSp ) |
